data.description: Use your retirement savings as equity to purchase an investment property through your Self-Managed Super Fund with a Company Trustee
data.name: Self-Managed Super Fund Fully Drawn Loan Variable Residential Principal and Interest

fees.name: Default Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Will be charged monthly until no longer in default

fees.name: Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per Consent if required to Consent to the registration of a Land Titles document over the security property to a third party

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If Heritage is required to produce a security document to the State's Land Titles Authority or agency

fees.name: Redocumentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you apply to change the specific details of your facility or substitute securities

fees.name: Overseas Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a cheque in foreign currency is deposited to your facility account (note: Heritage does not always accept these deposits).

fees.name: Document/Record Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For record searches, traces, supplying copy of details of transactions (including Visa card transaction slips) on your facility account (refunded if fee was charged for transaction-specific information and the transaction was incorrectly debited).

fees.name: Heritage Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each cheque drawn by Heritage on itself which is issued from your facility account.  $10.00 per cheque (including replacement cheques).

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a telegraphic transfer is made from your facility account via RTGS within Australia

fees.name: RTGS Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a payment/transfer to your facility account via RTGS occurs.

fees.name: Transaction Listing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When a transaction listing between two given dates is issued on your facility account.

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For the second and each subsequent statement issued during a month, or when a statement is issued on your facility account at your request at any time before the next statement issuing date

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a direct debit authorised to be made from or to your account is dishonoured

fees.name: SMS Alert
fees.additionalInfo: $0.25 for each SMS Alert delivered by SMS to your mobile phone.

eligibility.additionalInfo: SMSF Trustee must be a Company and separate from the Property Trustee
Property Trustee must be a Company and separate from the SMSF Trustee

features.additionalInfo: Variable or Fixed interest rate options
Loan terms up to 25 years with residential security and up to 15 years with commercial security.
Principal and interest repayments on all security types
Maximum loan to valuation (LVR) ratio is 80% for residential property, 70% for commercial property
